item.title: Epistemic meaning and the LLL tune in American English
item.description: Sostarics, Thomas; Cole, Jennifer (2022). Epistemic meaning and the LLL tune in American English. Proceedings of the 1st International Conference on Tone and Intonation. Sonderborg, Denmark.
